dublinCore.title: JavaScript Library Selector
dublinCore.creator: Claude AI
dublinCore.subject: Web Development
dublinCore.description: Interactive decision tree to select the right JavaScript visualization library for different needs including p5.js, Chart.js, Plotly.js, vis-network, vis-timeline, Leaflet.js, and Mermaid.js

learningObjectives: Select the appropriate JavaScript library for a given visualization task
Compare library features, sizes, and learning curves
Apply decision criteria when starting new projects

controls.label: Start Over
controls.description: Reset the decision tree to the beginning
